description:
Immediately after arriving in Artemis Academy, Seth decides to take part in the ceremony welcoming new residents to the city. However, the founder of the academy, Master Lord Majesty, ends up saddling him with a certain immense penalty. Seth then proceeds to search for Yaga, the powerful sorcerer Alma told him to meet, but he unwittingly lands in more and more trouble!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Paradise of Wisdom and Hope: Artemis
Eichi to Kibou no Rakuen: Artemis
Le paradis du savoir et de l`espoir
